mapper.insert: insert into customer_service(cs_title, cs_content, cs_writer, cs_category, temporary) values (#{csTitle}, #{csContent}, #{csWriter}, #{csCategory}, #{temporary})
mapper.update: update customer_service set cs_title= #{csTitle}, cs_content =#{csContent}, cs_category = #{csCategory}, `temporary`=1 where cs_id = #{csId}
update customer_service set cs_view= cs_view + 1 where cs_id =#{csId}
mapper.select: select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by cs_id desc)as cs_no, cs.* from customer_service cs where cs.temporary = 1) cs2 where (cs2.cs_no between #{start} and #{end})

select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by cs_id desc)as cs_no, cs.* from customer_service cs where cs.cs_category=#{category1} and cs.temporary=1) cs2 where cs2.cs_no between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from customer_service cs where cs.temporary =1
select count(*) from customer_service where cs_category=#{category1} and temporary=1
select count(*) from customer_service where cs_writer = #{search1} and temporary=1

select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by cs_id desc) as cs_no, cs.* from customer_service cs where cs.cs_writer = #{search1} and cs.temporary=1) cs2 where cs2.cs_no between #{start} and #{end}
select * from customer_service where cs_Writer= #{csWriter} and `temporary`= 0
